editorialNotes.standard: Fast-paced, accessible, and utterly brilliant, Marvel Snap‚Äôs quick, competitive matches are packed with seemingly infinite possibilities. Do you annoy opponents by dominating the first round‚Äôs playing field with Squirrel Girl‚Äôs rodent hordes? Or do you build your 12-card deck around the complementary card effects of the Guardians of the Galaxy? There‚Äôs no wrong answer. Fantastic animations, abilities, and art that perfectly channel the personality of the comics help make this one of the best card games on the App Store.
